title: Store: Adding Product Variants
body:
Store: Adding Product Variants¶


  1. Select There are multiple variants of this product with different options (color, size, etc)

  2. Click + Add Option

  3. Enter a title (e.g. Color)

  4. Enter the values and enter each by pressing the return key, the tab key, or “,” (e.g. Red, Green, Blue, White, Black)

  5. Click Done

  6. Repeat steps for all desired variants

  7. Click to edit a product variant

  8. Click to delete a product variant
toc: • Store: Adding Product Variants
